model.name: Run Away Sneaker
model.disambiguatingDescription: Reinterpreting a classic running shoe, the Run Away sneaker is one of the icons of the Louis Vuitton shoe collection. This version contrasts blue Monogram denim with white calf leather for a fresh, summery feel. It is signed with the LV Circle logo on the side, while the wedge-shaped outsole adds extra height.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Monogram denim and calf leather
  • Bleu Jeans Blue
  • Technical rubber outsole
  • Made in Italy
